entry.title: Game: Bravely Default (3DS, 2014) (8)
entry.content:
Game: Bravely Default (3DS, 2014) (8)20140316
I played for a lot today in the background of other things, like
Buffy.

The fight with Alternis is great, although it kind of sucks that
they don't change it if you have done the Vampire side
quest. Alternis is Ringabel!?

This is so weird! It's like Groundhog Day.

I started Chapter 5 at Level 74 with 2 Mastered Jobs. But then I
spent about two hours getting everyone to Level 99 and mastering
all jobs except for one, which I don't have yet. I started to beat
some of the Asterisks again, but you don't seem to get anything
for doing it, but it is nice to see the scene. I like trying to
pick a strategy that wins on Auto. It's a fun constraint.

Total time: 43:53
  • Video Games
  • Bravely Default
  • 3DS
  • 2014

entry.title: Buffy & Angel - Season 3 - Episode 9 - The Wish
entry.content:
Buffy & Angel - Season 3 - Episode 9 - The Wish20140316
I feel so bad for Cordy in this episode. It is also neat though
that this has such a different take on the Buffy universe that
could have been. I like that they brought the Master back. It's
also neat to have Anya introduced.
  • TV Shows
  • Buffy & Angel

entry.title: Buffy & Angel - Season 3 - Episode 10 - Amends
entry.content:
Buffy & Angel - Season 3 - Episode 10 - Amends20140316
This is a pretty intense episode. It's nice to see Angel
literally tortured by his memories, because you get to learn more
about him. This is a deep episode in the mythology as it
foreshadows a lot of things that happen later on.
  • TV Shows
  • Buffy & Angel

entry.title: Buffy & Angel - Season 3 - Episode 11 - Gingerbread
entry.content:
Buffy & Angel - Season 3 - Episode 11 - Gingerbread20140316
On one level, this is a ridiculous episode, because the little
kids have an unbelievable amount of influence. On the other hand,
it's really cool because you see Joyce's real feelings about the
Slayer and she correctly says that Buffy doesn't really do that
much good because she's too reactionary.
  • TV Shows
  • Buffy & Angel

entry.title: Game: Bravely Default (3DS, 2014) (5)
entry.content:
Game: Bravely Default (3DS, 2014) (5)20140313
I had a flight today and played for like eight hours. I made it to
Chapter 3 and was at Level 52 with 6 Jobs at Level 9 and one at
Level 4. I was just about to the fight the Behemoth. Actually I
tried but died real bad. It's cool that this required boss is so
hard yet I have such a huge level. I also got to the point where I
could use the Big Pharam trick, so I set it up during dinner and
overnight. When I woke up, I went from 60k to 2.4mil, but the
enemy was killed, so I don't think it worked all night.

Total time: 29:02

  • Bravely Default
  • 3DS
  • 2014

entry.title: Buffy & Angel - Season 3 - Episode 8 - Lovers Walk
entry.content:
Buffy & Angel - Season 3 - Episode 8 - Lovers Walk20140312
Spike is so crazy and fun; it's fun when he chats with
Joyce. Xander is such an idiot. I hate him for hurting Cordy. At
this point in the show, it's very sad that the Scoobies don't go
out of their way to integrate Faith in. Given what happens, it's
amazing that they don't feel some blame.
  • TV Shows
  • Buffy & Angel

entry.title: Movie: The Lego Movie, starring Chris Pratt (2014)
entry.content:
Movie: The Lego Movie, starring Chris Pratt (2014)20140311
This movie is brilliant. I love the way they commit to being Legos
and the twist at the end is really sweet. There are so many cute
things happening in the background... it seems like the perfect
movie to watch again and again to find more details.

entry.title: Game: Lightning Returns: Final Fantasy 13 (PS3, 2014) (18)
entry.content:
Game: Lightning Returns: Final Fantasy 13 (PS3, 2014) (18)20140309
I played for about four hours today and got the rest of the
trophies. At first, I just wandered around the world and did
stuff, for about three hours. Then I realized that if I just
wanted to get the trophies and not beat the game again, I could
just go get accessories. So I switched and did that. It only took
about 30 minutes more after that. I restarted and got all the
accessories again in just an hour. It was nice to complete
everything. I don't feel like the Pallas Athena garb is great
though.

Overall, I love this game. I think I prefer it to FF13-2, but not
FF13-1. This series is just so good. The battle system is amazing
and the story is so nuts. I like that this game doesn't have any
mindless grindy parts. Even fighting the Last Ones is really fun
because they are bosses. I think the main disadvantage of this
game versus the others is that there aren't as many bosses or
crazy enemies. Still, the combat is so amazing.

Game     1: 66:45    
Game    1+:  3:28    
Game   1++:  1:00
Total time: 71:16
  • Video Games
  • Lightning Returns: Final Fantasy 13
  • PS3
  • 2014

entry.title: Buffy & Angel - Season 3 - Episode 5 - Homecoming
entry.content:
Buffy & Angel - Season 3 - Episode 5 - Homecoming20140309
I like the "real life" aspects of this episode. I also love
Cordelia's hair at the homecoming. Cordy is on fire the whole
episode actually, especially when she tells off the
vampire. Faith is also great, she has like three lines, but
they're all amazing.
  • TV Shows
  • Buffy & Angel

entry.title: Game: Bravely Default (3DS, 2014) (2)
entry.content:
Game: Bravely Default (3DS, 2014) (2)20140307
I played for about eight and a half hours again on a flight. I had
some fun boss fights. I was able to beat Othros in two rounds: the
first using Invigorate and then using Hidden Dragon. I used almost
the same strategy against the Summoner but because I knew the
fight was coming, I turned everyone into Monks and beat her in a
single round using just Hidden Dragons. 

On the other hand, when I fought the Time Mage & Sword Fencer and
Ranger, I didn't see the fight coming so I fought them with really
weak and weird jobs, like a Freelancer, Merchant, Thief, and Time
Mage.

I'm trying to get Level 9 on most of jobs. I did, however, just
decide to get Level 10 on Freelancer so I can get the JP%
increase.

Also, since I got the Summoner job, I need to go back to the Wind
Temple, where I noticed the Summoner guy. I'm currently partly
through Mt. Fragmentum.

I really enjoy the game still, but am definitely overpowered from
playing at 200% Encounter Rate. For instance, when I switched to
Chapter 2, everyone was level 36 and I had two jobs each at level
9, plus one other job at level 6.

Something I really like about the game, but am surprised about, is
that when you beat the job enemies they really die. It's intense.

Total time: 17:01
  • Video Games
  • Bravely Default
  • 3DS
  • 2014

entry.title: Game: Bravely Default (3DS, 2014)
entry.content:
Game: Bravely Default (3DS, 2014)20140304
I played for a lot today because I had a flight. The game is
awesome. The story is really cute and the characters are great
too. I think the voice acting is really good, especially the way
the dialogue works out. I've been playing at 100% Encounter Rate
the whole time. It's pretty fun. I'm not grinding at all, but I'm
just exploring and fighting tons of battles. It's cool that you
can do Auto battles.

Total time: 8:28
  • Video Games
  • Bravely Default
  • 3DS
  • 2014

entry.title: Movie: Frozen, starring Kristen Bell (2013)
entry.content:
Movie: Frozen, starring Kristen Bell (2013)20140302
This was a very cute movie. I liked how it was really a story about
sisters than about romance. Similarly, I like how it's about a
fairly abstract thing---hiding emotions---but makes it
literal. Very cool.
  • Movies
  • 2013

entry.title: Game: Lightning Returns: Final Fantasy 13 (PS3, 2014) (17)
entry.content:
Game: Lightning Returns: Final Fantasy 13 (PS3, 2014) (17)20140301
I played today for about three hours. I exterminated everything,
got the Ultima Weapon, and then beat the game. I beat the game on
my first try with a Magic guard. I used 3 X-Potions, 2 Phoenix
Downs, and 1 Arise. It was pretty intense.

I really liked the ending. It was very nice to remember the whole
game and I like the final moments. The extra scene at the end of
the credits was cool too.

I turned on the New Game+ on Hard for a little bit just to see how
things worked. I feel like I won't like doing every Side Quest
again because it is so "busy" but I will like fighting again. I
think the biggest thing I'm worried about is that it will take a
lot of time to get the materials to get the upgrade trophies. I
found that skipping the cut-scenes was a little annoying and slow.

Game     1: 66:45    
Game    1+:  0:17    
Total time: 67:05
  • Video Games
  • Lightning Returns: Final Fantasy 13
  • PS3
  • 2014
